name: Eyes on the Dice
description:
An evil dice demon has captured you! Fortunately, he is quite sleepy and will only open his eyes once in a while, but when he does, your fate will be decided by the dice that he will see. Clear your way to the dice and roll for your life!

Made in 48 hours for GMTK Game Jam 2022 "Roll of the Dice"

Controls: 

WASD or Arrow Keys

Dice Results:

In general, it's good to go for higher numbers!

  1. Rock
  2. Goo
  3. Slime
  4. Box
  5. Jar
  6. Coin

Match the two die to to get a pickaxe!

The third spawn is based off the result (sum) of the two die.

Credits
  • Music: https://raphytator.itch.io/musics-for-video-games-or-other
  • Sound Effects: https://timothyadan.itch.io/global-game-jam-2018-sfx-bundle
  • Font: https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-free
